trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to iterate through subpaths in a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> and test the types of shapes contained in each subpath.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a capacidade de iterar subcaminhos em um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> e os tipos de formas contidas em cada subcaminho de teste.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object for which this helper class is to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto para o qual esta classe auxiliar deve ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> property and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes*> property arrays of the associated <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <> </> *> propriedade e <> </> *> matrizes de propriedade de associado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> em dois especificado matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Use the `startIndex` and `endIndex` parameters to copy a specified range of the path data.
trans-unit.target: Use o `startIndex` e `endIndex` parâmetros para copiar um intervalo de dados o caminho especificado.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: No retorno, contém uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que representa os pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: No retorno, contém uma matriz de bytes que representa os tipos de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o índice inicial das matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ending index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o índice final das matrizes.

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos copiado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamando `Dispose` permite que os recursos usados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>objeto a ser realocada para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> property and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes*> property arrays of the associated <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <> </> *> propriedade e <> </> *> matrizes de propriedade de associado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> em dois especificado matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: No retorno, contém uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que representa os pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: No retorno, contém uma matriz de bytes que representa os tipos de pontos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos copiado.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes que ela é recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the path associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> contains a curve.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o caminho associado a esta <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> contém uma curva.

trans-unit.source: All curves in a path are stored as sequences of Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Todas as curvas em um caminho são armazenadas como sequências de splines de Bézier.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you add an ellipse to a path, you specify the upper-left corner, the width, and the height of the ellipse's bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você adiciona uma elipse a um caminho, especifique o canto superior esquerdo, a largura e a altura do retângulo delimitador da elipse.

trans-unit.source: Those numbers (upper-left corner, width, and height) are not stored in the path; instead; the ellipse is converted to a sequence of four Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Esses números (canto superior esquerdo, largura e altura) não são armazenados no caminho; em vez disso, elipse é convertida em uma sequência de splines de Bézier quatro.

trans-unit.source: The path stores the endpoints and control points of those Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de controle desses splines de Bézier e os pontos de extremidade de repositórios de caminho.

trans-unit.source: A path stores an array of data points, each of which belongs to a line or a Bézier spline.
trans-unit.target: Um caminho armazena uma matriz de pontos de dados, cada um deles pertence a uma linha ou um spline de Bézier.

trans-unit.source: If some of the points in the array belong to Bézier splines, then HasCurve returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se alguns pontos na matriz de pertencem ao splines de Bézier, retorna HasCurve `true`.

trans-unit.source: If all points in the array belong to lines, then HasCurve returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os pontos na matriz pertencem a linhas, retorna HasCurve `false`.

trans-unit.source: Certain methods flatten a path, which means that all the curves in the path are converted to sequences of lines.
trans-unit.target: Certos métodos nivelar um demarcador, o que significa que todas as curvas no caminho são convertidas em sequências de linhas.

trans-unit.source: After a path has been flattened, HasCurve will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Depois que um caminho bidimensionais, sempre retornará HasCurve `false`.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> class will flatten a path.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>, ou o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A>método de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>classe nivele um caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current subpath contains a curve; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se subcaminho atual contiver uma curva; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> object has a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> objeto tem um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto associado a ele.

trans-unit.source: The NextMarker method increments the associated <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to the next marker in its path and copies all the points contained between the current marker and the next marker (or end of path) to a second <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object passed in to the parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método NextMarker incrementa associado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> para o próximo marcador em seu caminho e copia todos os pontos contidos entre o marcador atual e o próximo marcador (ou final do caminho) para a segunda <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto passado para o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>método para definir marcadores em um caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: Marcadores são usados para criar grupos de subcaminhos.

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais subcaminhos podem ser entre dois marcadores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object to which the points will be copied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> do objeto para o qual os pontos serão copiados.

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos entre esse marcador e a próxima.

trans-unit.source: Increments the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> to the next marker in the path and returns the start and stop indexes by way of the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: Incrementa o <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> para o próximo marcador no caminho e retorna os índices de início e parada por meio de parâmetros [out].

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>método para definir marcadores em um caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: Marcadores são usados para criar grupos de subcaminhos.

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais subcaminhos podem ser entre dois marcadores.

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that starts a subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] A referência de inteiro fornecida para esse parâmetro recebe o índice do ponto que inicia um subcaminho.

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that ends the subpath to which `startIndex` points.
trans-unit.target: [out] A referência de inteiro fornecida para esse parâmetro recebe o índice do ponto que termina o subcaminho para o qual `startIndex` pontos.

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos entre esse marcador e a próxima.

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting index and the ending index of the next group of data points that all have the same type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a partir do índice e o índice final do próximo grupo de dados aponta que todos têm o mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the point type shared by all points in the group.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o tipo de ponto compartilhado por todos os pontos no grupo.

trans-unit.source: Possible types can be retrieved from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Possíveis tipos podem ser recuperados do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice inicial do grupo de pontos.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice final do grupo de pontos.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of data points in the group.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna o número de pontos de dados no grupo.

trans-unit.source: If there are no more groups in the path, this method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais grupos no caminho, esse método retornará 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next figure (subpath) from the associated path of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a figura a seguir (subcaminho) do caminho associado deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that is to have its data points set to match the data points of the retrieved figure (subpath) for this iterator.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> que é fazer com que seus dados pontos definida para corresponder os pontos de dados da figura recuperado (subcaminho) para esse iterador.

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the current subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] Indica se o subcaminho atual é fechado.

trans-unit.source: It is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the if the figure is closed, otherwise it is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: É <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o se a figura está fechada, caso contrário, será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of data points in the retrieved figure (subpath).
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos de dados na Figura recuperado (subcaminho).

trans-unit.source: If there are no more figures to retrieve, zero is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma figuras mais para recuperar, zero será retornado.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> to the next subpath in the path.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> para o próximo subcaminho do caminho.

trans-unit.source: The start index and end index of the next subpath are contained in the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: O índice inicial e o índice do fim do próximo subcaminho estão contidas nos parâmetros [out].

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice inicial do próximo subcaminho.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice final do próximo subcaminho.

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] Indica se o subcaminho está fechado.

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O número de subcaminhos no <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Rewinds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> to the beginning of its associated path.
trans-unit.target: Retrocede isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> para o início de seu caminho associado.

trans-unit.source: The first time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method of an iterator, it gets the first figure (subpath) of that iterator's associated path.
trans-unit.target: Na primeira vez que você chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>que método de um iterador, ele obtém o primeiro número (subcaminho) do caminho associado que do iterador</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second time, it gets the second figure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Na segunda vez, ele obtém a Figura segundo e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: When you call the Rewind method, the sequence starts over; that is, after you call Rewind, the next call to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> gets the first figure in the path.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama o método Rewind, a sequência começa ou seja, depois de chamar Rewind, a próxima chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>obtém o primeiro número no caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> methods behave similarly.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A>métodos se comportam da mesma forma.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de subcaminhos no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: O número de subcaminhos no caminho.
